title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed.
OB: The dynamic text content type has no effect when applied.
EB: The dynamic text content type should have an effect on the corresponding content.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a content item with dynamic text content type.
2. Apply the dynamic text content type to the content item.
3. Observe that the content item does not display the expected dynamic behavior.
